image.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art control room. A tiny pixel bee mascot studies a glowing wall of monitors displaying charts and graphs in bright lime green (#ecf874). Soft pastel gradient background (lavender to mint). Chunky retro tech sprites, warm ambient lighting. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text on screen: 'METRICS'. Nostalgic, smart, and welcoming.

reasoning: Focuses on the 'Economics Dashboard' as a sign of maturity/transparency (appeals to builders/founders) and the 'OpenAI Embeddings' as a technical upgrade (appeals to devs). The tone is confident and operational.
